name: Kit Harvey
title: Full Stack Developer
description: I'm a results-oriented Full Stack Developer based in the Philippines, specializing in building high-performance, SEO-optimized web applications. I focus on creating scalable, efficient, and effective solutions by leveraging expertise across the entire technology stack, from front-end interfaces to back-end systems.

meta.keywords: full stack developer, web developer, SEO optimization, web performance, back-end developer, front-end developer, portfolio, Kit Harvey, web development, Philippines developer, performance-driven developer

og.siteName: Kit Harvey - Full Stack Developer | SEO & Performance Focused
og.imageAlt: Kit Harvey Full Stack Developer Portfolio Preview | SEO & Performance Focused

overview.title: About Me
overview.summary: Throughout my career, I've architected and contributed to projects requiring robust full-stack solutions, focusing on performance optimization and search engine visibility. I thrive in environments where I can collaborate on building impactful, scalable, and technically sound applications that drive results. My goal is always to deliver efficient code and measurable improvements.
overview.note: Beyond coding, I am committed to continuous learning in full-stack technologies, SEO best practices, and performance optimization techniques.

contact.title: Let's Connect
contact.description: Interested in collaborating or discussing a project? Feel free to reach out via email or connect with me on these platforms.

experience.title: Professional Experience
experience.description: A summary of my contributions and roles focused on building performance-driven applications.

responsibilities: Developed performant user and admin dashboards using SvelteKit and TailwindCSS, focusing on fast load times and efficient state management.
Collaborated with UI/UX designers to implement interfaces optimized for user experience and Core Web Vitals.
Ensured front-end implementation adhered to SEO best practices for discoverability.
Developed responsive user interfaces with a primary focus on cross-browser performance optimization.
Implemented front-end features ensuring efficient rendering and interaction.
Worked on improving website speed and overall technical SEO health.
Developed and optimized high-fidelity UI components for enhanced performance and user engagement.
Refactored front-end codebase for improved performance, maintainability, and adherence to SEO guidelines.
Contributed to improving page load speeds across key user flows.
Engineered modular front-end features designed for performance and scalability.
Integrated various third-party APIs, ensuring efficient data fetching and minimal performance impact.
Implemented front-end logic with attention to code efficiency and speed.
